name: Mała pętla Bieszczadzka
description: Mała pętla Bieszczadzka is a shorter variant of the famous loop road in the Bieszczady mountains. The loop takes us around the Solina lake, giving us a good taste of mountainous terrain we can expect on the bigger loop.

point_of_interests.name: LOTOS fuel
point_of_interests.description: It is advised to tank here before departing. Gas stations in more remote areas might have fuel of questionable quality

point_of_interests.name: Korbania
point_of_interests.description: Small detour to a 1 hour each way hike to one of the best vistas in the area. There is a wooden tower on the summit that provides a great view of the surrounding area.

point_of_interests.name: Czatownia bistro
point_of_interests.description: The only restaurant on this side of the loop, although you might find food in hotels, which there is plenty of along the way.

point_of_interests.name: Mountain bends
point_of_interests.description: Two 180 degree turns that might pose some challenge to inexperienced motorcyclists.

point_of_interests.name: Abandoned orthodox church
point_of_interests.description: Abandoned building - Cerkiew parafialna pw Przemienienia Pańskiego

name: Duża pętla Bieszczadzka
description: Duża pętla Bieszczadzka is a longer variant of the famous loop road in the Bieszczady mountains. Constant hikes and descends, fantastic turns and beautiful scenery place it in the 'must ride' category of Polish motorcycle routes. The bigger loop also takes us deeper into the mountains and forests of the Bieszczady national park.

point_of_interests.name: LOTOS fuel
point_of_interests.description: It is advised to tank here before departing. Gas stations in more remote areas might have fuel of questionable quality.

point_of_interests.name: Mountain turns
point_of_interests.description: A couple big turns that might cause problems if the road is wet

point_of_interests.name: Mountain turns with a view
point_of_interests.description: Beautiful scenery as you descend down a hill

point_of_interests.name: Hike to IWW mass graves
point_of_interests.description: Nice hike on lesser known trails of Bieszczady

name: Jeziorsko
description: A ride around the Jeziorsko artificial lake. Not very overwhelming. It is very uniqie to go there after September ends, as the lake is being drained of water from the winter. If you own a dirt bike you can try riding on the lake bed.

point_of_interests.name: Restaurants in the area
point_of_interests.description: This area has a couple nice restaurants, some of them with a view of the lake

point_of_interests.name: Water recreation
point_of_interests.description: Many recreation centers in the area can offer kayaks, jet-skis and more

point_of_interests.name: Marina and beach
point_of_interests.description: Nice marina for sailing yachts, especially stunning when the lake is drained.
